title: Robot Line Follower
description: Line Follower Robot is an autonomous robot designed to follow a path with black lines on a white surface or vice versa. My group and I got this project in the 4th semester of the robotics course. This robot walks by following a path and can also turn. The main components are an infrared sensor, microcontroller, motor driver, DC motor/servo.
